title: Zijn moeilijkste opdracht
description: SUNDANCE'S TOUGHEST JOBThe Tucson Ring, a group of greedy business men, were getting fat on keeping the Indian Wars alive in Arizona Territiry. One of their plans was to keep Geronimo on the loose by supplying him with whiskey and ammo. General Crook had a plan to stop them, and Jim Sundance was part of his plan. He said to Jim, "I want you to find out who's selling whiskey and guns to Geronimo. I want you to bring Geronimo in for good."The fate of the whole Apache nation hung on the answer Sundance was to give General Crook.All Sundance books are based on fact; this one clings especially close to it. BRONCO TRAIL tells the Geronimo story the way it really happened.
author: John Benteen
